{{html: 
<div class="section" id="object-operations">
<h1>Object Operations<a class="headerlink" href="#object-operations" title="Permalink to this headline"></a></h1>
<div class="section" id="put-object">
<h2>Put Object<a class="headerlink" href="#put-object" title="Permalink to this headline"></a></h2>
<p>Adds an object to a bucket. You must have write permissions on the bucket to perform this operation.</p>
<div class="section" id="syntax">
<h3>Syntax<a class="headerlink" href="#syntax" title="Permalink to this headline"></a></h3>
<div class="highlight-python"><pre>PUT /{bucket}/{object} HTTP/1.1</pre>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" id="request-headers">
<h3>Request Headers<a class="headerlink" href="#request-headers" title="Permalink to this headline"></a></h3>
<table border="1" class="docutils">
<colgroup>
<col width="14%">
<col width="28%">
<col width="50%">
<col width="8%">
</colgroup>
<thead valign="bottom">
<tr class="row-odd"><th class="head">Name</th>
<th class="head">Description</th>
<th class="head">Valid Values</th>
<th class="head">Required</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody valign="top">
<tr class="row-even"><td><strong>content-md5</strong></td>
<td>A base64 encoded MD-5 hash of the message.</td>
<td>A string. No defaults or constraints.</td>
<td>No</td>
</tr>
<tr class="row-odd"><td><strong>content-type</strong></td>
<td>A standard MIME type.</td>
<td>Any MIME type. Default: <tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">binary/octet-stream</span></tt></td>
<td>No</td>
</tr>
<tr class="row-even"><td><strong>x-amz-meta-&lt;...&gt;</strong></td>
<td>User metadata.  Stored with the object.</td>
<td>A string up to 8kb. No defaults.</td>
<td>No</td>
</tr>
<tr class="row-odd"><td><strong>x-amz-acl</strong></td>
<td>A canned ACL.</td>
<td><tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">private</span></tt>, <tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">public-read</span></tt>, <tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">public-read-write</span></tt>, <tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">authenticated-read</span></tt></td>
<td>No</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" id="copy-object">
<h2>Copy Object<a class="headerlink" href="#copy-object" title="Permalink to this headline"></a></h2>
<p>To copy an object, use <tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">PUT</span></tt> and specify a destination bucket and the object name.</p>
<div class="section" id="id1">
<h3>Syntax<a class="headerlink" href="#id1" title="Permalink to this headline"></a></h3>
<div class="highlight-python"><pre>PUT /{dest-bucket}/{dest-object} HTTP/1.1
x-amz-copy-source: {source-bucket}/{source-object}</pre>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" id="id2">
<h3>Request Headers<a class="headerlink" href="#id2" title="Permalink to this headline"></a></h3>
<table border="1" class="docutils">
<colgroup>
<col width="31%">
<col width="40%">
<col width="20%">
<col width="10%">
</colgroup>
<thead valign="bottom">
<tr class="row-odd"><th class="head">Name</th>
<th class="head">Description</th>
<th class="head">Valid Values</th>
<th class="head">Required</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody valign="top">
<tr class="row-even"><td><strong>x-amz-copy-source</strong></td>
<td>The source bucket name + object name.</td>
<td>{bucket}/{obj}</td>
<td>Yes</td>
</tr>
<tr class="row-odd"><td><strong>x-amz-acl</strong></td>
<td>A canned ACL.</td>
<td><tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">private</span></tt>,
<tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">public-read</span></tt>,
<tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">public-read-write</span></tt>,
<tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">authenticated-read</span></tt></td>
<td>No</td>
</tr>
<tr class="row-even"><td><strong>x-amz-copy-if-modified-since</strong></td>
<td>Copies only if modified since the timestamp.</td>
<td>Timestamp</td>
<td>No</td>
</tr>
<tr class="row-odd"><td><strong>x-amz-copy-if-unmodified-since</strong></td>
<td>Copies only if unmodified since the timestamp.</td>
<td>Timestamp</td>
<td>No</td>
</tr>
<tr class="row-even"><td><strong>x-amz-copy-if-match</strong></td>
<td>Copies only if object ETag matches ETag.</td>
<td>Entity Tag</td>
<td>No</td>
</tr>
<tr class="row-odd"><td><strong>x-amz-copy-if-none-match</strong></td>
<td>Copies only if object ETag doesn&#8217;t match.</td>
<td>Entity Tag</td>
<td>No</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
</div>
<div class="section" id="response-entities">
<h3>Response Entities<a class="headerlink" href="#response-entities" title="Permalink to this headline"></a></h3>
<table border="1" class="docutils">
<colgroup>
<col width="29%">
<col width="15%">
<col width="56%">
</colgroup>
<thead valign="bottom">
<tr class="row-odd"><th class="head">Name</th>
<th class="head">Type</th>
<th class="head">Description</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody valign="top">
<tr class="row-even"><td><strong>CopyObjectResult</strong></td>
<td>Container</td>
<td>A container for the response elements.</td>
</tr>
<tr class="row-odd"><td><strong>LastModified</strong></td>
<td>Date</td>
<td>The last modified date of the source object.</td>
</tr>
<tr class="row-even"><td><strong>Etag</strong></td>
<td>String</td>
<td>The ETag of the new object.</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" id="remove-object">
<h2>Remove Object<a class="headerlink" href="#remove-object" title="Permalink to this headline"></a></h2>
<p>Removes an object. Requires WRITE permission set on the containing bucket.</p>
<div class="section" id="id3">
<h3>Syntax<a class="headerlink" href="#id3" title="Permalink to this headline"></a></h3>
<div class="highlight-python"><pre>DELETE /{bucket}/{object} HTTP/1.1</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" id="get-object">
<h2>Get Object<a class="headerlink" href="#get-object" title="Permalink to this headline"></a></h2>
<p>Retrieves an object from a bucket within RADOS.</p>
<div class="section" id="id4">
<h3>Syntax<a class="headerlink" href="#id4" title="Permalink to this headline"></a></h3>
<div class="highlight-python"><pre>GET /{bucket}/{object} HTTP/1.1</pre>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" id="id5">
<h3>Request Headers<a class="headerlink" href="#id5" title="Permalink to this headline"></a></h3>
<table border="1" class="docutils">
<colgroup>
<col width="23%">
<col width="40%">
<col width="27%">
<col width="10%">
</colgroup>
<thead valign="bottom">
<tr class="row-odd"><th class="head">Name</th>
<th class="head">Description</th>
<th class="head">Valid Values</th>
<th class="head">Required</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody valign="top">
<tr class="row-even"><td><strong>range</strong></td>
<td>The range of the object to retrieve.</td>
<td>Range: bytes=beginbyte-endbyte</td>
<td>No</td>
</tr>
<tr class="row-odd"><td><strong>if-modified-since</strong></td>
<td>Gets only if modified since the timestamp.</td>
<td>Timestamp</td>
<td>No</td>
</tr>
<tr class="row-even"><td><strong>if-unmodified-since</strong></td>
<td>Gets only if not modified since the timestamp.</td>
<td>Timestamp</td>
<td>No</td>
</tr>
<tr class="row-odd"><td><strong>if-match</strong></td>
<td>Gets only if object ETag matches ETag.</td>
<td>Entity Tag</td>
<td>No</td>
</tr>
<tr class="row-even"><td><strong>if-none-match</strong></td>
<td>Gets only if object ETag matches ETag.</td>
<td>Entity Tag</td>
<td>No</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
</div>
<div class="section" id="response-headers">
<h3>Response Headers<a class="headerlink" href="#response-headers" title="Permalink to this headline"></a></h3>
<table border="1" class="docutils">
<colgroup>
<col width="17%">
<col width="83%">
</colgroup>
<thead valign="bottom">
<tr class="row-odd"><th class="head">Name</th>
<th class="head">Description</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody valign="top">
<tr class="row-even"><td><strong>Content-Range</strong></td>
<td>Data range, will only be returned if the range header field was specified in the request</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" id="get-object-info">
<h2>Get Object Info<a class="headerlink" href="#get-object-info" title="Permalink to this headline"></a></h2>
<p>Returns information about object. This request will return the same
header information as with the Get Object request, but will include
the metadata only, not the object data payload.</p>
<div class="section" id="id6">
<h3>Syntax<a class="headerlink" href="#id6" title="Permalink to this headline"></a></h3>
<div class="highlight-python"><pre>HEAD /{bucket}/{object} HTTP/1.1</pre>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" id="id7">
<h3>Request Headers<a class="headerlink" href="#id7" title="Permalink to this headline"></a></h3>
<table border="1" class="docutils">
<colgroup>
<col width="23%">
<col width="40%">
<col width="27%">
<col width="10%">
</colgroup>
<thead valign="bottom">
<tr class="row-odd"><th class="head">Name</th>
<th class="head">Description</th>
<th class="head">Valid Values</th>
<th class="head">Required</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody valign="top">
<tr class="row-even"><td><strong>range</strong></td>
<td>The range of the object to retrieve.</td>
<td>Range: bytes=beginbyte-endbyte</td>
<td>No</td>
</tr>
<tr class="row-odd"><td><strong>if-modified-since</strong></td>
<td>Gets only if modified since the timestamp.</td>
<td>Timestamp</td>
<td>No</td>
</tr>
<tr class="row-even"><td><strong>if-unmodified-since</strong></td>
<td>Gets only if not modified since the timestamp.</td>
<td>Timestamp</td>
<td>No</td>
</tr>
<tr class="row-odd"><td><strong>if-match</strong></td>
<td>Gets only if object ETag matches ETag.</td>
<td>Entity Tag</td>
<td>No</td>
</tr>
<tr class="row-even"><td><strong>if-none-match</strong></td>
<td>Gets only if object ETag matches ETag.</td>
<td>Entity Tag</td>
<td>No</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" id="get-object-acl">
<h2>Get Object ACL<a class="headerlink" href="#get-object-acl" title="Permalink to this headline"></a></h2>
<div class="section" id="id8">
<h3>Syntax<a class="headerlink" href="#id8" title="Permalink to this headline"></a></h3>
<div class="highlight-python"><pre>GET /{bucket}/{object}?acl HTTP/1.1</pre>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" id="id9">
<h3>Response Entities<a class="headerlink" href="#id9" title="Permalink to this headline"></a></h3>
<table border="1" class="docutils">
<colgroup>
<col width="20%">
<col width="10%">
<col width="70%">
</colgroup>
<thead valign="bottom">
<tr class="row-odd"><th class="head">Name</th>
<th class="head">Type</th>
<th class="head">Description</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody valign="top">
<tr class="row-even"><td><tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">AccessControlPolicy</span></tt></td>
<td>Container</td>
<td>A container for the response.</td>
</tr>
<tr class="row-odd"><td><tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">AccessControlList</span></tt></td>
<td>Container</td>
<td>A container for the ACL information.</td>
</tr>
<tr class="row-even"><td><tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">Owner</span></tt></td>
<td>Container</td>
<td>A container for the object owner&#8217;s <tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">ID</span></tt> and <tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">DisplayName</span></tt>.</td>
</tr>
<tr class="row-odd"><td><tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">ID</span></tt></td>
<td>String</td>
<td>The object owner&#8217;s ID.</td>
</tr>
<tr class="row-even"><td><tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">DisplayName</span></tt></td>
<td>String</td>
<td>The object owner&#8217;s display name.</td>
</tr>
<tr class="row-odd"><td><tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">Grant</span></tt></td>
<td>Container</td>
<td>A container for <tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">Grantee</span></tt> and <tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">Permission</span></tt>.</td>
</tr>
<tr class="row-even"><td><tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">Grantee</span></tt></td>
<td>Container</td>
<td>A container for the <tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">DisplayName</span></tt> and <tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">ID</span></tt> of the user receiving a grant of permission.</td>
</tr>
<tr class="row-odd"><td><tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">Permission</span></tt></td>
<td>String</td>
<td>The permission given to the <tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">Grantee</span></tt> object.</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" id="set-object-acl">
<h2>Set Object ACL<a class="headerlink" href="#set-object-acl" title="Permalink to this headline"></a></h2>
<div class="section" id="id10">
<h3>Syntax<a class="headerlink" href="#id10" title="Permalink to this headline"></a></h3>
<div class="highlight-python"><pre>PUT /{bucket}/{object}?acl</pre>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" id="request-entities">
<h3>Request Entities<a class="headerlink" href="#request-entities" title="Permalink to this headline"></a></h3>
<table border="1" class="docutils">
<colgroup>
<col width="20%">
<col width="10%">
<col width="70%">
</colgroup>
<thead valign="bottom">
<tr class="row-odd"><th class="head">Name</th>
<th class="head">Type</th>
<th class="head">Description</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody valign="top">
<tr class="row-even"><td><tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">AccessControlPolicy</span></tt></td>
<td>Container</td>
<td>A container for the response.</td>
</tr>
<tr class="row-odd"><td><tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">AccessControlList</span></tt></td>
<td>Container</td>
<td>A container for the ACL information.</td>
</tr>
<tr class="row-even"><td><tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">Owner</span></tt></td>
<td>Container</td>
<td>A container for the object owner&#8217;s <tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">ID</span></tt> and <tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">DisplayName</span></tt>.</td>
</tr>
<tr class="row-odd"><td><tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">ID</span></tt></td>
<td>String</td>
<td>The object owner&#8217;s ID.</td>
</tr>
<tr class="row-even"><td><tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">DisplayName</span></tt></td>
<td>String</td>
<td>The object owner&#8217;s display name.</td>
</tr>
<tr class="row-odd"><td><tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">Grant</span></tt></td>
<td>Container</td>
<td>A container for <tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">Grantee</span></tt> and <tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">Permission</span></tt>.</td>
</tr>
<tr class="row-even"><td><tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">Grantee</span></tt></td>
<td>Container</td>
<td>A container for the <tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">DisplayName</span></tt> and <tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">ID</span></tt> of the user receiving a grant of permission.</td>
</tr>
<tr class="row-odd"><td><tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">Permission</span></tt></td>
<td>String</td>
<td>The permission given to the <tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">Grantee</span></tt> object.</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" id="initiate-multi-part-upload">
<h2>Initiate Multi-part Upload<a class="headerlink" href="#initiate-multi-part-upload" title="Permalink to this headline"></a></h2>
<p>Initiate a multi-part upload process.</p>
<div class="section" id="id11">
<h3>Syntax<a class="headerlink" href="#id11" title="Permalink to this headline"></a></h3>
<div class="highlight-python"><pre>POST /{bucket}/{object}?uploads</pre>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" id="id12">
<h3>Request Headers<a class="headerlink" href="#id12" title="Permalink to this headline"></a></h3>
<table border="1" class="docutils">
<colgroup>
<col width="14%">
<col width="28%">
<col width="50%">
<col width="8%">
</colgroup>
<thead valign="bottom">
<tr class="row-odd"><th class="head">Name</th>
<th class="head">Description</th>
<th class="head">Valid Values</th>
<th class="head">Required</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody valign="top">
<tr class="row-even"><td><strong>content-md5</strong></td>
<td>A base64 encoded MD-5 hash of the message.</td>
<td>A string. No defaults or constraints.</td>
<td>No</td>
</tr>
<tr class="row-odd"><td><strong>content-type</strong></td>
<td>A standard MIME type.</td>
<td>Any MIME type. Default: <tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">binary/octet-stream</span></tt></td>
<td>No</td>
</tr>
<tr class="row-even"><td><strong>x-amz-meta-&lt;...&gt;</strong></td>
<td>User metadata.  Stored with the object.</td>
<td>A string up to 8kb. No defaults.</td>
<td>No</td>
</tr>
<tr class="row-odd"><td><strong>x-amz-acl</strong></td>
<td>A canned ACL.</td>
<td><tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">private</span></tt>, <tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">public-read</span></tt>, <tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">public-read-write</span></tt>, <tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">authenticated-read</span></tt></td>
<td>No</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
</div>
<div class="section" id="id13">
<h3>Response Entities<a class="headerlink" href="#id13" title="Permalink to this headline"></a></h3>
<table border="1" class="docutils">
<colgroup>
<col width="26%">
<col width="8%">
<col width="66%">
</colgroup>
<thead valign="bottom">
<tr class="row-odd"><th class="head">Name</th>
<th class="head">Type</th>
<th class="head">Description</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody valign="top">
<tr class="row-even"><td><tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">InitiatedMultipartUploadsResult</span></tt></td>
<td>Container</td>
<td>A container for the results.</td>
</tr>
<tr class="row-odd"><td><tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">Bucket</span></tt></td>
<td>String</td>
<td>The bucket that will receive the object contents.</td>
</tr>
<tr class="row-even"><td><tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">Key</span></tt></td>
<td>String</td>
<td>The key specified by the <tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">key</span></tt> request parameter (if any).</td>
</tr>
<tr class="row-odd"><td><tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">UploadId</span></tt></td>
<td>String</td>
<td>The ID specified by the <tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">upload-id</span></tt> request parameter identifying the multipart upload (if any).</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" id="multipart-upload-part">
<h2>Multipart Upload Part<a class="headerlink" href="#multipart-upload-part" title="Permalink to this headline"></a></h2>
<div class="section" id="id14">
<h3>Syntax<a class="headerlink" href="#id14" title="Permalink to this headline"></a></h3>
<div class="highlight-python"><pre>PUT /{bucket}/{object}?partNumber=&amp;uploadId= HTTP/1.1</pre>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" id="http-response">
<h3>HTTP Response<a class="headerlink" href="#http-response" title="Permalink to this headline"></a></h3>
<p>The following HTTP response may be returned:</p>
<table border="1" class="docutils">
<colgroup>
<col width="14%">
<col width="15%">
<col width="70%">
</colgroup>
<thead valign="bottom">
<tr class="row-odd"><th class="head">HTTP Status</th>
<th class="head">Status Code</th>
<th class="head">Description</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody valign="top">
<tr class="row-even"><td><strong>404</strong></td>
<td>NoSuchUpload</td>
<td>Specified upload-id does not match any initiated upload on this object</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" id="list-multipart-upload-parts">
<h2>List Multipart Upload Parts<a class="headerlink" href="#list-multipart-upload-parts" title="Permalink to this headline"></a></h2>
<div class="section" id="id15">
<h3>Syntax<a class="headerlink" href="#id15" title="Permalink to this headline"></a></h3>
<div class="highlight-python"><pre>GET /{bucket}/{object}?uploadId=123 HTTP/1.1</pre>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" id="id16">
<h3>Response Entities<a class="headerlink" href="#id16" title="Permalink to this headline"></a></h3>
<table border="1" class="docutils">
<colgroup>
<col width="26%">
<col width="8%">
<col width="66%">
</colgroup>
<thead valign="bottom">
<tr class="row-odd"><th class="head">Name</th>
<th class="head">Type</th>
<th class="head">Description</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody valign="top">
<tr class="row-even"><td><tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">InitiatedMultipartUploadsResult</span></tt></td>
<td>Container</td>
<td>A container for the results.</td>
</tr>
<tr class="row-odd"><td><tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">Bucket</span></tt></td>
<td>String</td>
<td>The bucket that will receive the object contents.</td>
</tr>
<tr class="row-even"><td><tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">Key</span></tt></td>
<td>String</td>
<td>The key specified by the <tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">key</span></tt> request parameter (if any).</td>
</tr>
<tr class="row-odd"><td><tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">UploadId</span></tt></td>
<td>String</td>
<td>The ID specified by the <tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">upload-id</span></tt> request parameter identifying the multipart upload (if any).</td>
</tr>
<tr class="row-even"><td><tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">Initiator</span></tt></td>
<td>Container</td>
<td>Contains the <tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">ID</span></tt> and <tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">DisplayName</span></tt> of the user who initiated the upload.</td>
</tr>
<tr class="row-odd"><td><tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">ID</span></tt></td>
<td>String</td>
<td>The initiator&#8217;s ID.</td>
</tr>
<tr class="row-even"><td><tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">DisplayName</span></tt></td>
<td>String</td>
<td>The initiator&#8217;s display name.</td>
</tr>
<tr class="row-odd"><td><tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">Owner</span></tt></td>
<td>Container</td>
<td>A container for the <tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">ID</span></tt> and <tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">DisplayName</span></tt> of the user who owns the uploaded object.</td>
</tr>
<tr class="row-even"><td><tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">StorageClass</span></tt></td>
<td>String</td>
<td>The method used to store the resulting object. <tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">STANDARD</span></tt> or <tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">REDUCED_REDUNDANCY</span></tt></td>
</tr>
<tr class="row-odd"><td><tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">PartNumberMarker</span></tt></td>
<td>String</td>
<td>The part marker to use in a subsequent request if <tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">IsTruncated</span></tt> is <tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">true</span></tt>. Precedes the list.</td>
</tr>
<tr class="row-even"><td><tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">NextPartNumberMarker</span></tt></td>
<td>String</td>
<td>The next part marker to use in a subsequent request if <tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">IsTruncated</span></tt> is <tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">true</span></tt>. The end of the list.</td>
</tr>
<tr class="row-odd"><td><tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">MaxParts</span></tt></td>
<td>Integer</td>
<td>The max parts allowed in the response as specified by the <tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">max-parts</span></tt> request parameter.</td>
</tr>
<tr class="row-even"><td><tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">IsTruncated</span></tt></td>
<td>Boolean</td>
<td>If <tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">true</span></tt>, only a subset of the object&#8217;s upload contents were returned.</td>
</tr>
<tr class="row-odd"><td><tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">Part</span></tt></td>
<td>Container</td>
<td>A container for <tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">Key</span></tt>, <tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">Part</span></tt>, <tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">InitiatorOwner</span></tt>, <tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">StorageClass</span></tt>, and <tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">Initiated</span></tt> elements.</td>
</tr>
<tr class="row-even"><td><tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">PartNumber</span></tt></td>
<td>Integer</td>
<td>The identification number of the part.</td>
</tr>
<tr class="row-odd"><td><tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">ETag</span></tt></td>
<td>String</td>
<td>The part&#8217;s entity tag.</td>
</tr>
<tr class="row-even"><td><tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">Size</span></tt></td>
<td>Integer</td>
<td>The size of the uploaded part.</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" id="complete-multipart-upload">
<h2>Complete Multipart Upload<a class="headerlink" href="#complete-multipart-upload" title="Permalink to this headline"></a></h2>
<p>Assembles uploaded parts and creates a new object, thereby completing a multipart upload.</p>
<div class="section" id="id17">
<h3>Syntax<a class="headerlink" href="#id17" title="Permalink to this headline"></a></h3>
<div class="highlight-python"><pre>POST /{bucket}/{object}?uploadId= HTTP/1.1</pre>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" id="id18">
<h3>Request Entities<a class="headerlink" href="#id18" title="Permalink to this headline"></a></h3>
<table border="1" class="docutils">
<colgroup>
<col width="31%">
<col width="12%">
<col width="48%">
<col width="9%">
</colgroup>
<thead valign="bottom">
<tr class="row-odd"><th class="head">Name</th>
<th class="head">Type</th>
<th class="head">Description</th>
<th class="head">Required</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody valign="top">
<tr class="row-even"><td><tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">CompleteMultipartUpload</span></tt></td>
<td>Container</td>
<td>A container consisting of one or more parts.</td>
<td>Yes</td>
</tr>
<tr class="row-odd"><td><tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">Part</span></tt></td>
<td>Container</td>
<td>A container for the <tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">PartNumber</span></tt> and <tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">ETag</span></tt>.</td>
<td>Yes</td>
</tr>
<tr class="row-even"><td><tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">PartNumber</span></tt></td>
<td>Integer</td>
<td>The identifier of the part.</td>
<td>Yes</td>
</tr>
<tr class="row-odd"><td><tt class="docutils literal"><span class="pre">ETag</span></tt></td>
<td>String</td>
<td>The part&#8217;s entity tag.</td>
<td>Yes</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
</div>
<div class="section" id="id19">
<h3>Response Entities<a class="headerlink" href="#id19" title="Permalink to this headline"></a></h3>
<table border="1" class="docutils">
<colgroup>
<col width="35%">
<col width="12%">
<col width="52%">
</colgroup>
<thead valign="bottom">
<tr class="row-odd"><th class="head">Name</th>
<th class="head">Type</th>
<th class="head">Description</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody valign="top">
<tr class="row-even"><td><strong>CompleteMultipartUploadResult</strong></td>
<td>Container</td>
<td>A container for the response.</td>
</tr>
<tr class="row-odd"><td><strong>Location</strong></td>
<td>URI</td>
<td>The resource identifier (path) of the new object.</td>
</tr>
<tr class="row-even"><td><strong>Bucket</strong></td>
<td>String</td>
<td>The name of the bucket that contains the new object.</td>
</tr>
<tr class="row-odd"><td><strong>Key</strong></td>
<td>String</td>
<td>The object&#8217;s key.</td>
</tr>
<tr class="row-even"><td><strong>ETag</strong></td>
<td>String</td>
<td>The entity tag of the new object.</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section" id="abort-multipart-upload">
<h2>Abort Multipart Upload<a class="headerlink" href="#abort-multipart-upload" title="Permalink to this headline"></a></h2>
<div class="section" id="id20">
<h3>Syntax<a class="headerlink" href="#id20" title="Permalink to this headline"></a></h3>
<div class="highlight-python"><pre>DELETE /{bucket}/{object}?uploadId= HTTP/1.1</pre>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>


          
}}
